Title:
Alessioporus and Pulchroboletus gen. nov. (Boletaceae,
Boletineae), two novel genera to accommodate Xerocomus ichnusanus and X.
roseoalbidus from European Mediterranean basin; molecular and
morphological evidence
Keywords:
Basidiomycota, Boletales, Boletus, epitypification,
European fungi, molecular phylogeny, biogeography, taxonomy
Abstract:
Alessioporus and Pulchroboletus are proposed as new

present research has focused on both morphological features and

elucidate the taxonomic status of these two rare Mediterranean boletes

Accurate macroâ and microscopical descriptions of the two species based
on inclusive taxon sampling are provided and supported by line drawings

taxa are also highlighted. In addition, epitype collections are selected
for both species.
